description: Non-material Amendment to Condition 3 (Drawings) of planning permission (Application ref. 2016/04585/VAR) dated 22 August 2017 (as amended by Non-Material Amendment Application (ref: 2018/02548/NMAT) dated 29 September 2018), in relation to Plot G1.Proposed amendments include the following: changes  to the building footprint to accommodate future maintenance and the inclusion of additional fire safety measures;  proposed additional second staircase, a protected lobby and an evacuation lift to comply with upcoming changes in the fire safety standards and regulations; amendments to the approved fa√ßade design; arrangement of the lower ground floor level layout; arrangement of the upper ground floor level layout; the typical residential floor level layouts; levels 08, 22, 23 and roof layouts; plant at levels 08 and 23; and the approved unit mix and distribution.
